Uses of Package
com.joliciel.talismane.lexicon

  • Packages that use com.joliciel.talismane.lexicon 
    Package Description
    com.joliciel.talismane
    Entry-point package for Talismane - for simple usage code samples, see the com.joliciel.talismane.examples package.
    com.joliciel.talismane.extensions.standoff
    A package for converting to and from CoNLL-X to standoff format, for interaction with annoation tools requiring this format.
    com.joliciel.talismane.fr
    Package for interaction with existing resources in French (such as the SPMRL French corpus), facilitating training and evaluation with these resources.
    com.joliciel.talismane.lexicon
    Interfaces and generic classes for handling lexicons, which are used in Talismane within various tokeniser, pos-tagger and parser features and rules, as well as for certain types of filters (e.g.
    com.joliciel.talismane.output
    Classes and templates for producing Talismane's output in CoNLL-X and related formats.
    com.joliciel.talismane.parser
    Transition-based dependency parsing (Parser), evaluation (ParserEvaluator), and output artefacts (ParseConfiguration, DependencyNode).
    com.joliciel.talismane.posTagger
    Package enabling the part-of-speech tagging of a TokenSequence.
    The central class is the (PosTagger).
    It tags based on a previously constructed classificaton model, converting the model's outcomes to PosTag using the currently set PosTagSet.
    The PosTagSet is set via TalismaneSession.setPosTagSet(PosTagSet).
    The pos-tagger prodces a PosTagSequence which is a list of PosTaggedToken.
    It can be evaluated via a PosTaggerEvaluator.
    com.joliciel.talismane.tokeniser
    Tokenisation package.
  • Classes in com.joliciel.talismane.lexicon used by com.joliciel.talismane 
    Class and Description
    LexicalEntryReader
    Reads lexical entries from any source whatsoever.
    LexiconServiceLocator 
    PosTaggerLexicon
    An interface for retrieving lexical information from a lexicon, including pos-tag specific information.

    Reads lexical entries from any source whatsoever.
  • Classes in com.joliciel.talismane.lexicon used by com.joliciel.talismane.lexicon 
    Class and Description
    LexicalAttribute
    The currently supported lexical attributes.
    LexicalEntry
    A single lexical entry for a given string.
    LexicalEntryFactory
    Allows for the generation of lexical entries of a particular type.
    LexicalEntryReader
    Reads lexical entries from any source whatsoever.
    LexicalEntryStatus
    A status, used only to select a single entry in the case of homographs, to indicate which lemma should be given preference.
    Lexicon
    An interface for retrieving lexical information from a lexicon.
    LexiconService 
    PosTaggerLexicon
    An interface for retrieving lexical information from a lexicon, including pos-tag specific information.
    PosTagMapper
    Used to retrieve a set of pos-tags for a given lexical entry.
    RegexLexicalEntryReader
    A lexical entry reader where the lexical attributes are identified via a set of regex.
    WritableLexicalEntry 
  • Classes in com.joliciel.talismane.lexicon used by com.joliciel.talismane.output
